mapper.update: update zmap_c_m2_charge set reg_code = #{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_code = #{patientCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charge_time = #{chargeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_code = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_code = #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fee_class_code = #{feeClassCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fee_type_code = #{feeTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fee_item_code = #{feeItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fee_source_code = #{feeSourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, settle_type_code = #{settleTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, num = #{num,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unit_price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount_amount = #{discountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discount_rate = #{discountRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iccard_code = #{iccardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zmap_dept_code = #{zmapDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zmap_fee_item_code = #{zmapFeeItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_hospital_code = #{subHospitalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital_code = #{hospitalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, settle_acct_code = #{settleAcctCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_insure_settle = #{isInsuresettle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acct_item_code = #{acctItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rec_status = #{recStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rec_type = #{recType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, morder_code = #{morderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where charge_code = #{chargeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update zmap_c_m2_charge m2 set m2.clinic_code = (select m1.clinic_id from zmap_c_m1_clinics m1 where m1.reg_code = m2.reg_code) where m2.clinic_code is null or m2.clinic_code=''

update zmap_c_m2_charge m2 set m2.clinic_code = (select m1.clinic_id from zmap_c_m1_clinics m1 where m1.reg_code = m2.reg_code) where m2.clinic_code is null or m2.clinic_code='' and SUBSTR(m2.charge_time,1,10) = #{curDate}
